message.entry: The model ''{0}'' uses Improved Component Modeling semantics. Only ERT or MDX targets are supported.
The model ''{0}'' is using Improved Component Modeling semantics, so the setting ''Configuration Parameters > Code Generation > Interface > Code interface packaging'' may not be set to ''C++ class''.
The model ''{0}'' is using Improved Component Modeling semantics, so the setting ''Configuration Parameters > Code Generation > Interface > External mode'' may not be selected.
The model ''{0}'' is using Improved Component Modeling semantics, so the setting ''AdvancedOptControl'' may not be set to "-SLCI".

Model ''{0}'' containing non-inlined Subsystem ''{1}'' is using Improved Component Modeling semantics, but the non-inlined Subsystem is neither a function-call subsystem, nor a Simulink Function. This is not allowed.
Model ''{0}'' containing ForEach Subsystem ''{1}'' is using Improved Component Modeling semantics and it is a class model. This is not allowed.

Referenced model ''{0}'' is using Improved Component Modeling semantics and it is a class model, but the setting for ''Total number of instances allowed per top model'' is not ''Multiple''. This is not allowed.

Referenced model ''{0}'' is using Improved Component Modeling semantics and it is not a class model, but the setting for ''Total number of instances allowed per top model'' is not ''One''. This is not allowed.
The model ''{0}'' is using Improved Component Modeling semantics, but Subsystem or Model block ''{1}'' is using variants. This is not allowed.
The model ''{0}'' is using Improved Component Modeling semantics and it is a class model, but Model block ''{1}'' is not referring to a class model. This is not allowed.

The model ''{0}'' is using Improved Component Modeling semantics and Model block ''{1}'' is referring to a class model, but the Model block is not inside the root system or a virtual subsystem. This is not allowed.

The model ''{0}'' is using Improved Component Modeling semantics, so the setting ''Configuration Parameters > Code Generation > Interface > Code interface packaging'' may not be set to ''Reusable function''.
Function ''{0}'' is public, and may not be invoked from Stateflow chart ''{1}''.
Model ''{0}'' containing public Simulink Function ''{1}'' is using Improved Component Modeling semantics and must follow export function rules.
The model ''{0}'' uses Improved Component Modeling semantics. Only Normal simulation mode is supported.
